Name: Child's pose Stretch
Description: 1. Start on your hands and knees. 2. Bring your big toes together and sit your hips back toward your heels.3. Stretch your arms forward, palms down, and rest your forehead on the floor.4. Relax and take slow, deep breaths.

Name: Front and Back Neck Stretch
Description: 1. Sit or stand up tall with your spine straight. 2. Slowly tuck your chin toward your chest to stretch the back of your neck. 3. Hold the stretch for a few seconds. 4. Gently tilt your head back to look up and stretch the front of your neck. 5. Return to center.

Name: Lateral Neck Stretch
Description: 1. Sit or stand with a straight back and relaxed shoulders. 2. Tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. 3. Hold for several seconds without raising your shoulder. 4. Return to center and repeat on the opposite side.

Name: Shoulder Circles
Description: 1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms at your sides. 2. Slowly lift your shoulders up toward your ears. 3. Roll your shoulders backward in a circular motion. 4. Repeat for several reps, then reverse the direction.

Name: Ankle Circles
Description: 1. Sit in a chair or stand and lift one foot off the ground. 2. Rotate your ankle in a slow, controlled clockwise circle. 3. Complete several rotations, then reverse direction. 4. Repeat on the other ankle.

Name: Knee Circles
Description: 1. Stand with your feet together and knees slightly bent. 2. Place your hands gently on your knees. 3. Make slow circular motions with both knees together. 4. Complete several clockwise circles, then go counterclockwise.

Name: Wrist Circles stretch
Description: 1. Extend your arms forward at shoulder height. 2. Make fists with your hands. 3. Slowly rotate your wrists in small circles, clockwise. 4. After several rotations, reverse direction. 5. Shake out your wrists afterward to relax them.

Name: Seated Hamstring
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with one leg extended straight. 2. Bend the opposite leg and place the sole of your foot against the inner thigh. 3. Reach forward toward the toes of the extended leg, keeping your back straight. 4. Hold the stretch and repeat on the other leg.

Name: Side-Lying Floor Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your side with your legs stacked and straight. 2. Extend your top arm overhead, reaching away from your body. 3. Keep your hips aligned and stretch through the side of your torso. 4. Hold the position, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Pelvic Tilt
Description: 1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart and knees slightly bent. 2. Place your hands on your hips. 3. Gently tuck your pelvis under by tightening your abdominal muscles. 4. Hold for a few seconds, then return to a neutral standing position. 5. Repeat as needed for spinal mobility.

Name: Angel Stretch
Description: 1. Stand or sit with your back against a wall and arms raised to shoulder height. 2. Bend your elbows to form a 90-degree angle (like a goalpost). 3. Slowly raise your arms upward while keeping elbows and hands in contact with the wall. 4. Lower them back down and repeat to stretch the chest and shoulders.

Name: Looking at Ceiling Stretch
Description: 1. Stand or sit with a straight back. 2. Slowly tilt your head back to look up at the ceiling. 3. Keep your shoulders relaxed and chest open. 4. Hold for a few seconds, then return to neutral. 5. Great for neck flexibility and posture.

Name: Mountain Pose
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet together and arms at your sides. 2. Spread your toes and evenly distribute weight on both feet. 3. Engage your thighs and lift your chest. 4. Reach your arms overhead, palms facing each other. 5. Breathe deeply and hold the pose to promote body awareness and balance.

Name: Upward Stretch
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart. 2. Extend both arms overhead with palms facing inward or together. 3. Reach upward while keeping shoulders down. 4. Engage your core and lengthen through the spine. 5. Hold the stretch and breathe deeply.

Name: Arm Circle
Description: 1. Stand with your arms extended straight out to the sides at shoulder height. 2. Make small, controlled circles with your arms in a forward direction.

Name: Elbow Circles
Description: 1. Stand or sit upright with your arms bent and fingertips touching your shoulders.  2. Begin to slowly rotate your elbows in a circular motion forward.  3. Complete several circles, then reverse direction and rotate backwards.  4. Keep your movements smooth and controlled throughout.

Name: Stomach Vacuum
Description: 1. Stand or kneel upright with your back straight and shoulders relaxed.  2. Take a deep breath in, then exhale all the air out of your lungs.  3. Without inhaling, pull your belly button in toward your spine as much as possible.  4. Release and repeat as needed.

Name: Overhead Stretch
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Raise both arms straight above your head.  3. Interlace your fingers or press your palms together.  4. Reach upward and slightly back to stretch your arms and torso.  5. Hold the stretch.

Name: Couch Stretch
Description: 1. Kneel on one knee in front of a couch or wall, with the other foot flat on the floor in front of you.  2. Place the back foot on the couch or wall, shin vertical and toes pointing upward.  3. Slowly rise into a tall kneeling position, keeping your torso upright.  4. Push your hips slightly forward to feel the stretch in the quad and hip flexor of the back leg.  5. Hold the stretch , then switch sides.

Name: Garland Pose
Description: 1. Stand with your feet slightly wider than hip-width apart and turn your toes out slightly.  2. Lower into a deep squat, bringing your hips as low as possible while keeping your heels on the floor.  3. Press your elbows into the inside of your knees and bring your palms together at your chest.  4. Keep your back straight and chest lifted.  5. Hold the pose and breathe deeply.

Name: Standing Torso Twist Stretch
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.  2. Place your hands on your hips or extend your arms to the sides for balance.  3. Slowly twist your torso to the right, keeping your hips facing forward.  4. Hold for a few seconds, then return to center.  5. Repeat the twist to the left. Continue alternating sides.

Name: Lying Cross-Over Lower Back Stretch
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with arms extended out to the sides in a T-shape.  2. Bend your right knee and cross it over your body toward the left side.  3. Keep your shoulders flat on the floor and let your knee gently rest near the ground.  4. Turn your head to the right for a deeper spinal twist.  5. Hold the position, then switch sides.

Name: Shin Hug
Description: 1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.  2. Bring both knees up toward your chest.  3. Wrap your arms around your shins and gently pull your knees closer.  4. Keep your head and shoulders relaxed on the floor.  5. Hold the stretch while breathing deeply.

Name: Table Pose
Description: 1. Start on your hands and knees in a tabletop position.  2. Align your wrists under your shoulders and knees under your hips.  3. Keep your back flat and gaze down at the floor.  4. Engage your core and maintain neutral spine alignment.  5. Hold the position while breathing steadily.

Name: Seated Twist
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with both legs extended straight.  2. Bend your right knee and place your right foot on the outside of your left thigh.  3. Place your right hand behind you for support.  4. Inhale and raise your left arm, then exhale and twist to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee.  5. Hold the stretch, then switch sides.

Name: Side-Bend Pose
Description: 1. Stand or sit upright with your feet or hips firmly grounded.  2. Extend your right arm overhead and place your left hand on your left hip or thigh.  3. Inhale and lengthen your spine, then exhale and gently bend to the left side.  4. Keep your chest open and avoid collapsing forward.  5. Hold, then repeat on the other side.

Name: Pec Stretch
Description: 1. Stand near a wall or doorway.  2. Place your forearm against the wall with your elbow bent at 90 degrees and shoulder height.  3. Step forward with the opposite leg and gently turn your torso away from the wall.  4. You should feel a stretch across your chest and shoulder.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Lat Stretch
Description: 1. Stand upright or sit on your knees.  2. Reach both arms overhead and clasp your right wrist with your left hand.  3. Gently pull your right arm to the left while bending your torso in the same direction.  4. Keep your core engaged and avoid twisting the spine.  5. Hold for 20–30 seconds, then repeat on the other side.

Name: Cat-Cow
Description: 1. Begin on your hands and knees in a tabletop position.  2. Inhale and arch your back, lifting your head and tailbone up (Cow Pose).  3. Exhale and round your spine, tucking your chin and pelvis under (Cat Pose).  4. Move slowly between the two positions with each breath.

Name: IT Band and Glute Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with both legs extended.  2. Bend your right knee and cross it over your body to the left side.  3. Use your left hand to gently press your right knee toward the floor.  4. Extend your right arm to the side and keep both shoulders flat.  5. Hold the stretch, then switch sides.

Name: Single-Leg Lying Cross-Over Stretch
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with arms extended out to the sides.  2. Bend your right knee and cross it over your body to the left.  3. Let your right knee rest on the floor or as far as comfortable.  4. Keep your shoulders grounded and look toward your right hand.  5. Hold, then repeat on the other side.

Name: Straddle Stretch
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with your legs extended wide apart.  2. Keep your back straight and toes pointed up.  3. Place your hands in front of you and slowly walk them forward.  4. Lean your torso toward the floor without rounding your back.  5. Hold the stretch while breathing deeply.

Name: Frog Stretch
Description: 1. Start on your hands and knees with knees wide apart and feet turned out.  2. Slowly lower your forearms to the ground.  3. Slide your knees wider if comfortable and align ankles behind the knees.  4. Press your hips back slightly to deepen the stretch.  5. Hold for while keeping your core engaged.

Name: Side Lying Groin Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your left side with your left leg extended.  2. Bend your right knee and place your right foot flat on the floor in front of your left thigh.  3. Use your right hand to gently press the knee down toward the floor.  4. You should feel a stretch in the inner thigh and groin.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Groin and Back Stretch
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with your feet together and knees bent out to the sides.  2. Hold your feet with your hands and sit up tall.  3. Slowly bend forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.  4. Gently press your knees down toward the floor with your elbows.  5. Hold while breathing deeply.

Name: Adductor Stretch
Description: 1. Stand with your feet wide apart.  2. Shift your weight to the right leg and bend your right knee.  3. Keep your left leg straight and your toes pointing forward.  4. Lean slightly forward to deepen the stretch in your left inner thigh.  5. Hold, then repeat on the other side.

Name: Peroneals
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.  2. Cross your right leg over your left.  3. Use your left hand to gently pull your right foot inward toward your body.  4. You should feel the stretch along the outer side of your lower leg.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Calf Stretch
Description: 1. Stand facing a wall and place your hands on it at shoulder height.  2. Step one foot back and press the heel into the ground.  3. Keep the back leg straight and the front leg slightly bent.  4. Lean forward gently until you feel a stretch in the calf of the back leg.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Wall calf stretch
Description: 1. Stand facing a wall and place your toes of one foot against the wall.  2. Keep your heel on the floor and your knee straight.  3. Lean your upper body forward slightly toward the wall.  4. You should feel a stretch in your calf and Achilles tendon.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Seated Calf Stretch
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with one leg extended and the other bent.  2. Loop a towel or band around the ball of your extended foot.  3. Gently pull the towel toward you while keeping your knee straight.  4. Keep your back upright and core engaged.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Calf Stretch Elbows Against Wall
Description: 1. Stand facing a wall with both elbows placed against it at shoulder height.  2. Step one leg back, keeping it straight with the heel pressed into the floor.  3. The front knee can be bent slightly for balance.  4. Lean your hips forward until you feel a stretch in the calf of the back leg.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Kneeling Forearm Stretch
Description: 1. Start on all fours on the floor.  2. Rotate your forearms so your palms face up and fingers point toward your knees.  3. Gently lean your hips back to increase the stretch in your forearms.  4. Keep your arms fully in contact with the ground.  5. Hold while breathing deeply.

Name: Lying glute stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with both knees bent and feet flat on the floor.  2. Cross your right ankle over your left knee, forming a figure-four.  3. Reach through your legs and grasp behind your left thigh.  4. Gently pull your left thigh toward your chest.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Knee Across The Body
Description: 1. Lie on your back with your legs extended.  2. Bring one knee up and across your body toward the opposite side.  3. Keep both shoulders flat on the floor.  4. Use your opposite hand to gently press the knee toward the floor.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: One Knee To Chest
Description: 1. Lie on your back with both legs extended.  2. Bring one knee toward your chest while keeping the other leg straight.  3. Clasp your hands around your shin and gently pull the knee closer.  4. Keep your back flat against the floor.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Seated Glute Stretch
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with legs extended in front of you.  2. Cross your right leg over your left, placing the foot flat on the ground.  3. Hug your right knee to your chest or twist slightly to the right for a deeper stretch.  4. Keep your back tall and core engaged.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Leg-Up Hamstring Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your back near a doorway or wall corner.  2. Extend one leg up and rest it vertically against the wall or doorframe.  3. Keep the other leg flat on the ground.  4. Adjust your distance from the wall to increase or decrease the stretch.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Knee To Chest
Description: 1. Lie on your back with both legs extended.  2. Bend one knee and bring it toward your chest.  3. Clasp your hands around the shin or behind the thigh.  4. Gently pull the leg closer to deepen the stretch.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Standing hamstring stretch
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Extend one leg forward, placing the heel on the ground and toes pointing up.  3. Hinge at the hips and lean forward slightly, keeping the back straight.  4. Rest your hands on the bent leg or hips for support.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Upper Back-Leg Grab
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended.  2. Raise one leg and clasp behind the thigh or calf.  3. Gently pull the leg toward your chest while keeping it as straight as possible.  4. Keep the opposite leg on the ground.  5. Hold for 20–30 seconds, then switch legs.

Name: One Arm Against Wall
Description: 1. Stand sideways next to a wall.  2. Extend the arm closest to the wall straight back, placing your palm on the surface.  3. Slowly rotate your torso away from the wall.  4. Feel the stretch across your chest and shoulder.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Iron Cross Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms extended out to form a "T" shape.  2. Lift one leg straight up, then cross it over your body toward the opposite side.  3. Try to keep your shoulders flat on the ground.  4. Let the foot hover or rest lightly on the floor for support.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Chair Lower Back Stretch
Description: 1. Sit on a chair with feet flat on the floor.  2. Slowly bend forward, bringing your chest toward your thighs.  3. Let your arms dangle toward the floor.  4. Relax your neck and back.

Name: Pyramid Stretch
Description: 1. Stand with one leg forward and the other back, both feet flat on the ground.  2. Keep both legs straight as you hinge at the hips.  3. Reach your hands toward your front foot or shin.  4. Keep your back flat and chest open.

Name: Lower Back Stretch - Yates Variation
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.  2. Slightly bend your knees and place hands on your thighs.  3. Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back flat.  4. Push your hips slightly backward to feel a stretch in your lower back.

Name: Cobra Stretch
Description: 1. Lie face down with hands under your shoulders.  2. Press into your palms to lift your chest off the floor.  3. Keep elbows slightly bent and shoulders relaxed.  4. Gaze upward without straining your neck.

Name: Downward-Facing Dog Stretch
Description: 1. Start on your hands and knees.  2. Tuck your toes and lift your hips toward the ceiling.  3. Straighten your legs as much as possible.  4. Press your heels toward the floor and keep your back flat.

Name: Spine Twist
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with legs extended.  2. Bend one knee and place the foot outside the opposite thigh.  3. Place the opposite arm on the bent knee.  4. Twist your torso gently toward the bent leg.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Spinal Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.  2. Let both knees drop to one side while keeping your shoulders flat.  3. Extend your arms out in a “T” shape.  4. Look toward the opposite direction of your knees.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Upper Back Stretch
Description: 1. Sit or stand tall with your arms extended in front of you.  2. Clasp your hands together and round your upper back.  3. Push your hands forward as you tuck your chin to your chest.  4. Feel the stretch across your upper back and shoulders.

Name: Middle Back Stretch
Description: 1. Kneel on all fours with hands directly under shoulders.  2. Round your back upward, pulling your belly in.  3. Tuck your chin slightly toward your chest.  4. Hold the position, focusing on the middle back area.

Name: All Fours Quad Stretch
Description: 1. Start on all fours on a soft surface.  2. Extend one leg back and bend the knee.  3. Reach back with the opposite hand and hold the ankle.  4. Gently pull the foot toward your glutes.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Hip Flexors
Description: 1. Stand upright and take a long step backward with one leg.  2. Bend the front knee while keeping the back leg straight.  3. Shift your weight slightly forward.  4. Feel the stretch in the front of the back hip.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: On Your Side Quad Stretch
Description: 1. Lie on one side with legs stacked.  2. Grab the top ankle with your top hand.  3. Gently pull the heel toward your glutes.  4. Keep knees together and hips aligned.  5. Hold , then switch sides.

Name: Lying Prone Quadriceps
Description: 1. Lie face down on a mat.  2. Reach back and grab one ankle.  3. Gently pull the foot toward your glutes.  4. Keep hips pressed into the floor.  5. Hold, then switch legs.

Name: Half-Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
Description: 1. Kneel on one knee with the other foot flat in front.  2. Keep torso upright and hips squared.  3. Shift forward into the front leg slightly.  4. Feel the stretch in the hip of the back leg.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Quad Stretch
Description: 1. Stand tall and grab your ankle with one hand.  2. Pull your foot toward your glutes.  3. Keep knees close together.  4. Maintain balance by holding onto a wall if needed.  5. Hol, then switch sides.

Name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
Description: 1. Stand or sit with arms relaxed.  2. Bring one arm across your body at chest level.  3. Use the opposite hand to press the arm closer to your chest.  4. Keep shoulders relaxed.  5. Hold , then switch sides.

Name: Shoulder Raise
Description: 1. Stand or sit with your arms by your sides.  2. Slowly lift both shoulders up toward your ears.  3. Hold for a second at the top.  4. Slowly lower them back down.  5. Repeat for several reps as a mobility warm-up or stretch.

Name: Shoulder Stretch on Floor
Description: 1. Lie on your side with your bottom arm extended in front.  2. Slowly rotate your torso toward the floor while keeping the arm straight.  3. Press your chest gently down to feel the shoulder stretch.  4. Keep the head relaxed and hips stacked.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Floor Angel
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Place arms at 90-degree angles like a goalpost.  3. Slowly slide your arms up, keeping them in contact with the floor.  4. Slide back down and repeat slowly.

Name: Triceps Stretch
Description: 1. Raise one arm overhead and bend the elbow.  2. Place the opposite hand on the bent elbow.  3. Gently push the elbow downward and inward.  4. Keep head neutral and back straight.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Triceps Extension
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart.  2. Extend one arm overhead and bend the elbow.  3. Use the opposite hand to pull the elbow behind your head.  4. Keep core engaged and avoid arching the back.  5. Hold for both sides.

Name: Seated Quad Contraction
Description: 1. Sit on a chair or mat with legs extended in front.  2. Press the back of one knee toward the ground by contracting your quad.  3. Hold the contraction for 5–10 seconds. 4. Relax and repeat.  5. Focus on full contraction without lifting the leg.

Name: Standing Hip Circles
Description: 1. Stand upright and place hands on hips or a support.  2. Lift one knee up to hip level.  3. Slowly rotate the hip in a wide circular motion.  4. Switch legs and repeat.

Name: Rocking Adductor Stretch
Description: 1. Begin in a kneeling position with one leg extended out to the side.  2. Keep both hands on the floor in front of you.  3. Gently rock your hips back toward your heel.  4. Feel the stretch along the inner thigh.  5. Rock forward and back, then switch sides.

Name: Dynamic Pigeon Stretch
Description: 1. Start in a plank or downward dog position.  2. Bring one knee forward, placing it behind your wrist.  3. Extend the opposite leg straight behind you.  4. Gently shift your weight forward and backward.  5. Perform for both legs.

Name: Seated Biceps
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with knees bent and hands behind you.  2. Fingers should point away from your body.  3. Gently slide your hips away from your hands.  4. Keep arms straight to feel the biceps stretch.

Name: Hip Stretch With Twist
Description: 1. Start in a lunge position with one leg forward.  2. Place the opposite hand on the floor inside the front foot.  3. Reach the other arm up and twist your torso.  4. Look up toward the raised hand.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Runner's Stretch
Description: 1. Begin in a lunge position with one leg forward and the other extended back.  2. Place both hands on either side of the front foot.  3. Straighten the front leg while keeping the back leg extended.  4. Lower your chest toward the extended leg.  5. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Standing Lat Stretch
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Raise one arm overhead and bend it slightly.  3. Grab the raised wrist with the opposite hand.  4. Gently pull and lean to the side to stretch the lat.  5. Hold, then switch arms.

Name: T-Spine Stretch on Wall
Description: 1. Stand facing a wall, arms extended and hands placed shoulder-width apart.  2. Step back and bend at the hips, keeping arms on the wall.  3. Lower your chest toward the ground while keeping your back straight.  4. Feel the stretch in your upper and mid-back.

Name: Good Morning Stretch
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart and place hands behind your head.  2. Keep a soft bend in the knees.  3. Hinge forward at the hips until your torso is parallel to the floor.  4. Keep back flat and core engaged.  5. Return to standing and repeat.

Name: Half Locust
Description: 1. Lie face down with arms at your sides.  2. Lift your head, chest, and one leg off the ground.  3. Keep the other leg relaxed and arms pressed lightly against the floor.  4. Hold the position.  5. Lower and switch legs.

Name: Seated Pike
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with legs extended straight in front of you.  2. Reach forward with both arms toward your toes.  3. Keep your back as straight as possible.  4. Hold when you feel a deep stretch in your hamstrings.  5. Breathe deeply and hold.

Name: Standing leg swing
Description: 1. Stand tall and hold onto a wall or support for balance.  2. Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled motion.  3. Keep your upper body stable and core engaged.  4. Switch sides and repeat.

Name: Prone Manual Hamstring
Description: 1. Lie on your back and raise one leg straight up.  2. Keep the opposite leg flat on the ground.  3. Use your hands or a band to gently pull the raised leg toward your chest.  4. Keep both legs straight.  5. Hold per leg.

Name: Bent-Over Scapular Slide
Description: 1. Bend forward at the hips with a flat back and arms overhead.  2. Slowly slide your arms down in a "W" shape.  3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.  4. Raise arms back to start position.

Name: Dynamic Back Stretch
Description: 1. Stand tall and interlace your fingers behind your head.  2. Gently arch your back while lifting your chest.  3. Slowly return to a neutral position.  4. Repeat the movement in a smooth, controlled manner.

Name: Bent Over Shoulder
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart and bend forward at the hips.  2. Let your arms hang down, then raise them out to the sides.  3. Squeeze your shoulder blades at the top.  4. Lower arms back down with control.

Name: Triceps dip
Description: 1. Sit on a stable chair or bench and place your hands beside your hips.  2. Slide your body forward so your hips are just off the edge.  3. Lower your body by bending the elbows to about 90 degrees.  4. Press through your palms to raise your body back up.

Name: Cross-Body Crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and hands behind your head.  2. Lift your head and shoulders off the floor.  3. Bring your right elbow toward your left knee as you twist your torso.  4. Return to start and repeat on the other side.  5. Alternate sides for reps.

Name: Alternating Heel-Touch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.  2. Keep your arms at your sides.  3. Crunch your torso slightly up and reach your right hand toward your right heel.  4. Return to center and repeat on the left side.  5. Alternate touches for total reps.

Name: Half Bird Dog
Description: 1. Begin on all fours in a tabletop position.  2. Extend one leg straight behind you while keeping your hips level.  3. Hold for 2–3 seconds, then return to start.  4. Switch sides and repeat.

Name: Standing Calf Raise
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Slowly raise your heels off the ground, balancing on the balls of your feet.  3. Hold at the top for a second.  4. Lower your heels back down with control.

Name: Alternating Step-Back
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.  2. Step one foot back into a lunge position.  3. Push through the front heel to return to standing.  4. Repeat with the opposite leg.  5. Alternate sides.

Name: Knees to Chest
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with legs extended.  2. Bring both knees toward your chest using your hands to gently pull them in.  3. Keep your lower back pressed into the floor.  4. Hold the stretch.  5. Release and repeat as needed.

Name: Side-lying leg lift
Description: 1. Lie on your side with legs extended and stacked.  2. Rest your head on your lower arm.  3. Lift your top leg up slowly to about 45 degrees.  4. Lower it back down with control.  5. Repeat for 12–15 reps per side.

Name: Isometric Chest Squeezes
Description: 1. Stand or sit upright with arms in front of your chest.  2. Press your palms together firmly.  3. Hold the squeeze, engaging your chest muscles.  4. Maintain position.  5. Release and repeat.

Name: Cross-Body Toe-Touch
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Raise your right arm and lift your left leg.  3. Reach your right hand across to touch your left toes.  4. Return to start and repeat on the other side.  5. Continue alternating sides.

Name: Left Knee-Up
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Shift weight to your right leg.  3. Lift your left knee up toward your chest.  4. Hold for 1–2 seconds and engage your core.  5. Lower and repeat.

Name: Right Side Bird-Dog
Description: 1. Start on all fours in a tabletop position.  2. Extend your right leg back and left arm forward.  3. Keep hips level and core engaged.  4. Hold for a few seconds, then return to start.

Name: Dead Bug
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms extended to the ceiling and knees bent at 90 degrees.  2. Lower your right arm and left leg simultaneously toward the floor.  3. Keep your lower back pressed into the mat.  4. Return to the start and switch sides.

Name: Slow Sit-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Cross arms over chest or place behind head.  3. Slowly roll your upper body up toward your knees.  4. Pause at the top, then lower down with control.

Name: Half-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent.  2. Cross arms over your chest.  3. Lift your upper back off the floor halfway, engaging your core.  4. Hold briefly, then lower down.

Name: Rear Leg Raises
Description: 1. Stand tall and hold onto a support for balance.  2. Extend one leg straight back without bending the knee.  3. Squeeze your glutes at the top.  4. Lower the leg slowly.

Name: Right Knee-Up
Description: 1. Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Shift weight to your left leg.  3. Lift your right knee up toward your chest.  4. Hold for 1–2 seconds and engage your core.

Name: Left Side Bird-Dog
Description: 1. Start on all fours.  2. Extend your left leg back and right arm forward.  3. Keep your core tight and hips level.  4. Hold briefly, then return to start.

Name: Single-Leg Curl Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with one knee bent and the other leg extended.  2. Cross arms over your chest.  3. Slowly curl your upper body toward the bent knee.  4. Lower down with control.  5. Switch sides after a few reps.

Name: Hollow Hold
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms extended overhead and legs straight.  2. Lift your shoulders and legs off the ground.  3. Keep lower back pressed to the floor.  4. Hold.  5. Release and repeat.

Name: Side Plank
Description: 1. Lie on your side with forearm under your shoulder.  2. Stack your feet and lift your hips off the ground.  3. Keep your body in a straight line.  4. Hold.  5. Switch sides and repeat.

Name: Glute bridge
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Keep arms by your sides.  3. Lift your hips until your body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees.  4. Squeeze glutes at the top.  5. Lower down and repeat.

Name: Frankenstein
Description: 1. Stand tall with arms extended in front.  2. Swing your right leg straight up to touch your left hand.  3. Lower leg and repeat on the other side.  4. Keep core tight and avoid leaning back.  5. Alternate for both sides.

Name: Squat Hold
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Lower into a squat position, keeping knees over toes.  3. Hold the position with your thighs parallel to the floor.  4. Keep back straight and chest lifted.  5. Hold.

Name: Sit Squats
Description: 1. Stand in front of a chair with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Slowly lower yourself until you’re just above the chair.  3. Pause briefly without sitting.  4. Push through your heels to stand back up. 5. Repeat.

Name: Side Leg Raises
Description: 1. Stand or lie on your side with legs straight.  2. Slowly lift the top leg upward without rotating your hips.  3. Pause at the top.  4. Lower back down with control.

Name: Single-leg balance and reach
Description: 1. Stand on one leg with slight bend in the knee.  2. Reach your opposite hand toward the ground in front of you.  3. Keep back flat and core engaged.  4. Return to standing position.

Name: Low Lunge with External Twist and Arm Reach
Description: 1. Step one leg back into a low lunge.  2. Place the opposite hand on the ground.  3. Twist your torso toward the front leg and reach the other arm overhead.  4. Hold.

Name: Quadruped Thoracic Rotation
Description: 1. Start on all fours in a tabletop position.  2. Place one hand behind your head.  3. Rotate your upper body, bringing the elbow under your body.  4. Then rotate upward toward the ceiling.  5. Repeat per side.

Name: Standing hip extension
Description: 1. Stand upright holding a sturdy surface for balance.  2. Shift weight to one leg and extend the opposite leg straight back.  3. Keep the movement slow and controlled, avoiding arching the back.  4. Squeeze glutes at the top.  5. Return and repeat per side.

Name: Walking Glute Stretch
Description: 1. Stand upright and step forward with one leg.  2. Pull the opposite knee toward your chest with both hands.  3. Pause briefly to stretch the glute.  4. Release and step forward with the other leg.  5. Continue alternating.

Name: Alternating standing glute stretch
Description: 1. Stand tall and cross your right ankle over your left thigh.  2. Sit back into a squat position while holding the stretch.  3. Balance and hold for a few seconds.  4. Return to standing and switch sides.

Name: Alternating Standing Knee-Pull Stretch
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Lift one knee to your chest and pull gently with both hands.  3. Hold for a moment, then lower.  4. Repeat on the other side.  5. Continue alternating.

Name: Goal Post to Squat
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and arms in goal post position (elbows bent at 90°).  2. Lower into a squat while maintaining arm position.  3. Stand up and press arms upward.  4. Return to starting position.  5. Repeat.

Name: Elbow plank
Description: 1. Start on your forearms and toes with body in a straight line.  2. Keep elbows directly under shoulders.  3. Engage core and glutes.  4. Avoid dropping hips or raising your back.  5. Hold.

Name: Lower Back Curl
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Tilt your pelvis and slowly curl your lower back off the floor.  3. Pause briefly, engaging your abs.  4. Lower back down slowly.  5. Repeat.

Name: Elbow-to-knee crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with hands behind your head and knees bent.  2. Bring one elbow toward the opposite knee while lifting your shoulders.  3. Return to start and switch sides.  4. Alternate for total reps.

Name: Side Bridge
Description: 1. Lie on your side with elbow under shoulder.  2. Stack feet and lift hips off the ground.  3. Keep your body aligned.  4. Hold.

Name: Straight-Arm Plank
Description: 1. Start in a push-up position with arms fully extended.  2. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.  3. Engage your core and avoid sagging hips.  4. Hold.

Name: Bird-Dog Plank
Description: 1. Begin in a high plank position.  2. Lift one arm and opposite leg simultaneously.  3. Hold briefly while keeping your core stable.  4. Return to plank and switch sides.

Name: Side-Plank Arm Wrap
Description: 1. Begin in a side plank position on your elbow.  2. Reach top arm under your body, rotating your torso.  3. Return to start and repeat.

Name: Side Plank Pulse
Description: 1. Get into a side plank position.  2. Slowly lower your hips slightly.  3. Pulse your hips upward in small controlled movements.

Name: Fire Hydrant
Description: 1. Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.  2. Lift one leg out to the side while keeping the knee bent.  3. Pause at the top and lower.

Name: Pushups
Description: 1. Start in a high plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.  2. Lower your body toward the floor by bending your elbows.  3. Keep your body in a straight line.  4. Push back up to start.

Name: Glute bridge
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Keep arms by your sides.  3. Lift hips off the floor until your body forms a straight line.  4. Squeeze glutes at the top.  5. Lower down and repeat.

Name: T-Spine Rotation with Reach
Description: 1. Start on all fours.  2. Place one hand behind your head.  3. Rotate your elbow toward the ceiling, opening your chest.  4. Return to starting position.

Name: Glute Kickback
Description: 1. Start on all fours.  2. Extend one leg straight back, keeping the knee bent.  3. Squeeze glutes at the top.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Alternating Slow Step-Down With Chair
Description: 1. Stand on a sturdy chair or step.  2. Slowly lower one leg toward the floor.  3. Tap the floor lightly with your heel.  4. Return to start and switch legs.

Name: Hamstring Slide
Description: 1. Lie on your back with feet on sliders or towels.  2. Lift hips into a glute bridge.  3. Slowly extend legs out while keeping hips off the ground.  4. Slide feet back in and repeat.

Name: Back extension
Description: 1. Lie face down on a mat with arms at your sides or crossed over your chest.  2. Engage your lower back and lift your chest off the ground.  3. Keep your head in a neutral position.  4. Hold briefly at the top.  5. Lower down slowly and repeat.

Name: Superman
Description: 1. Lie face down with arms extended in front of you.  2. Simultaneously lift arms, chest, and legs off the ground.  3. Squeeze glutes and lower back at the top.  4. Hold for 1–2 seconds.  5. Lower back down and repeat.

Name: Knee Up-Down
Description: 1. Start in a high plank position.  2. Lower one arm at a time to your forearms into a low plank.  3. Push back up one arm at a time to high plank.  4. Keep core engaged and body straight.

Name: Walking Butt Kicks
Description: 1. Stand upright and begin walking forward.  2. With each step, kick your heel toward your glutes.  3. Swing arms naturally as you walk.

Name: Walking High Knees
Description: 1. Stand tall with arms at your sides.  2. Lift one knee toward your chest as you walk forward.  3. Swing the opposite arm forward.  4. Alternate knees with each step.

Name: Wall Sit
Description: 1. Stand against a wall and slide down into a seated position.  2. Keep thighs parallel to the floor and knees over ankles.  3. Hold the position with back flat against the wall.  4. Keep core tight.

Name: Lateral Squats
Description: 1. Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width.  2. Shift your weight to one side, bending the knee while keeping the other leg straight.  3. Push back to center.  4. Repeat on the other side.

Name: Decline Crunch
Description: 1. Lie on a decline bench with feet secured.  2. Cross arms over chest or place behind your head.  3. Engage your core and crunch upward.  4. Slowly return to starting position.

Name: Reverse crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with hands under hips.  2. Bend knees at 90 degrees.  3. Lift hips off the floor by curling knees toward chest.  4. Lower back down with control.

Name: Front Step
Description: 1. Stand tall facing a step or bench.  2. Step one foot onto the platform.  3. Press through the heel to lift your body up.  4. Step back down and switch legs.

Name: Russian twist
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with knees bent and feet off the ground.  2. Lean back slightly and clasp hands together.  3. Twist your torso to one side, then the other.  4. Keep your core tight.

Name: Bent-Knee Reverse Crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet off the ground.  2. Place hands under your hips.  3. Curl knees toward your chest, lifting hips off the floor.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Lying Oblique Crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your side with knees slightly bent.  2. Place the top hand behind your head.  3. Crunch sideways toward your hip.  4. Squeeze your obliques at the top.  5. Lower down and repeat.

Name: Push-Up Plank Hold
Description: 1. Begin in a high push-up position.  2. Keep hands under shoulders and body in a straight line.  3. Engage your core and glutes.

Name: Alternating Lying Leg Raise
Description: 1. Lie on your back with hands under hips.  2. Lift one leg off the floor to 45 degrees while the other stays down.  3. Lower and switch legs.

Name: Side-Plank with Hip Touch
Description: 1. Get into a side plank position.  2. Lower your hip toward the ground and lightly tap.  3. Raise back to plank.  4. Repeat.

Name: Alternating Slow L-Raise
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms at sides.  2. Slowly lift one straight leg upward.  3. Lower and alternate to the other leg.  4. Maintain a tight core.  5. Repeat.

Name: Slow Mountain Climber
Description: 1. Start in a high plank position.  2. Bring one knee toward your chest slowly.  3. Return to plank and alternate legs.  4. Continue with controlled movement.

Name: Hollow-Body Pulse
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended and arms overhead.  2. Lift your shoulders and legs off the ground.  3. Pulse arms and legs up and down slightly.  4. Keep core tight.

Name: Crab Walk
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with hands and feet flat.  2. Lift hips off the ground into a reverse tabletop position.  3. Walk forward using opposite hand and foot.  4. Then walk backward.

Name: Right Side Hollow Hold with Pulse
Description: 1. Lie on your right side with legs extended and stacked.  2. Raise both legs off the ground and lift shoulders slightly.  3. Keep core tight and body in a slight curve.  4. Pulse legs up and down a few inches.

Name: Left Side Hollow Hold with Pulse
Description: 1. Lie on your left side with legs extended and stacked.  2. Raise both legs off the floor and lift shoulders slightly.  3. Hold a slight hollow shape with core engaged.  4. Pulse legs gently.

Name: Leg Lift
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms at your sides.  2. Keep legs straight and raise them toward the ceiling.  3. Pause at the top.  4. Slowly lower back down without touching the floor.

Name: Flat Bench Leg Raise
Description: 1. Lie flat on a bench with legs extended off the end.  2. Hold the bench behind your head for support.  3. Lift legs until vertical.  4. Lower slowly to starting position.

Name: Hollow-Body Hold
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms overhead and legs extended.  2. Lift shoulders and legs off the floor into a banana shape.  3. Engage core and keep lower back pressed to floor. 4. Hold.

Name: Windmills
Description: 1. Stand with feet wide apart and arms extended to sides.  2. Twist your torso and reach right hand toward left foot.  3. Return to center and switch sides.  4. Repeat per side.

Name: Towel Straight Plank Hand Reach
Description: 1. Get into a straight-arm plank position.  2. Place a towel or slider under one hand.  3. Slide that hand forward, then pull it back.  4. Keep core tight and hips stable.  5. Alternate sides.

Name: Elbow Plank Swim
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank position.  2. Reach one arm forward in a swimming motion.  3. Return it to the ground and switch arms.  4. Keep your core braced and back flat.

Name: Seated Knee Pull-In Series
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with legs extended and hands behind for support.  2. Pull both knees toward your chest.  3. Extend them back out without touching the floor.

Name: Ab Tuck
Description: 1. Sit on the edge of a bench or mat.  2. Bring knees to chest while leaning torso forward.  3. Extend legs and torso outward without touching the ground.

Name: Squat Pulse
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Lower into a squat position.  3. Stay at the bottom and pulse up and down a few inches.  4. Keep weight in heels and back straight.

Name: Kick-Out
Description: 1. Sit on the floor with knees bent and hands behind you.  2. Lift feet slightly off the ground.  3. Extend both legs out, then pull back in.  4. Keep abs tight and controlled.

Name: Alternating Step-Up With Chair
Description: 1. Stand in front of a sturdy chair or step.  2. Step up with one foot, then bring the other foot up.  3. Step back down and repeat with the opposite leg.

Name: Single-leg glute bridge
Description: 1. Lie on your back with one leg bent and the other extended.  2. Push through the bent leg to lift your hips.  3. Squeeze glutes at the top.  4. Lower down and repeat.  5. Switch legs after a few reps.

Name: Hip Thrust
Description: 1. Sit on the ground with your back against a bench.  2. Place feet flat on the ground, shoulder-width apart.  3. Drive hips upward, squeezing glutes.  4. Lower hips back down and repeat.

Name: Bottoms Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended upward.  2. Contract your lower abs to lift your hips off the ground.  3. Keep feet pointing upward.  4. Lower slowly with control

Name: Decline Push-Up
Description: 1. Place feet on a bench or elevated surface.  2. Hands should be on the ground, slightly wider than shoulder-width.  3. Lower your chest to the ground.  4. Push back up to starting position.

Name: Bottoms Up
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with legs pointed straight up.  2. Use your lower abs to lift your hips toward the ceiling.  3. Keep movement small and controlled.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Full Moon
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart and arms extended forward.  2. Move arms in a large circular motion, mimicking a "full moon."  3. Engage core as you go around.  4. Reverse direction after a few reps.

Name: Bear Crawl Hold
Description: 1. Start on hands and knees with knees hovering off the floor.  2. Keep back flat and core engaged.  3. Hold position without letting knees touch.

Name: Hollow-Body Rock
Description: 1. Lie on your back in a hollow-body position with arms extended overhead and legs slightly off the ground.  2. Engage your core and rock back and forth like a boat.  3. Keep your lower back pressed to the floor.

Name: Hollow-Body Abduction
Description: 1. Begin in a hollow-body hold position.  2. With legs lifted, move them apart to a wide V.  3. Bring legs back together slowly.  4. Keep arms extended and core tight.

Name: Decline Leg Lift with Twist
Description: 1. Lie on a decline bench and hold handles above your head.  2. Raise both legs straight up.  3. At the top, twist hips to one side.  4. Lower back down slowly.  5. Alternate twists.

Name: Prison Push-Up
Description: 1. Get into a standard push-up position.  2. Lower your chest toward the floor.  3. Push back up and raise one knee to your chest.  4. Repeat, alternating legs.

Name: Toy Soldier
Description: 1. Stand tall with arms extended in front.  2. Kick your right leg up toward your left hand.  3. Lower and switch sides.  4. Keep core tight and back straight.

Name: Isometric Wipers
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with legs extended upward.  2. Hold your arms out wide on the floor for balance.  3. Lower legs to one side slowly while keeping shoulders down.  4. Return to center and hold.  5. Alternate sides, holding each position briefly.

Name: Cocoons
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms and legs extended.  2. Bring knees to chest and wrap arms around them.  3. Return to the starting position.  4. Keep movement controlled and core tight.

Name: Butt-Ups
Description: 1. Start in a forearm plank position.  2. Raise your hips toward the ceiling to form an inverted V.  3. Lower hips back into plank.  4. Engage core throughout.

Name: Leg Pull-In
Description: 1. Sit on a bench or mat with hands behind for support.  2. Extend legs out and lean back slightly.  3. Pull knees to your chest, then extend again.  4. Keep abs tight.

Name: Side Jackknife
Description: 1. Lie on your side with legs stacked and one hand behind your head.  2. Simultaneously raise upper leg and torso to meet.  3. Lower and repeat.  4. Complete all reps on one side before switching.

Name: Straight-Legged Hip Raise
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended upward.  2. Use your lower abs to lift hips off the ground.  3. Keep legs straight throughout.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Knee-to-Nose Pulse
Description: 1. Start in a downward dog or plank position.  2. Bring one knee toward your nose.  3. Pulse gently forward without touching the floor.  4. Repeat, then switch sides.

Name: Hollow-Body Knee Tuck
Description: 1. Begin in a hollow-body hold.  2. Tuck both knees toward your chest.  3. Extend legs back to the hollow position.  4. Keep your shoulders and feet off the floor.

Name: Side-Plank with Kick
Description: 1. Get into a side plank position.  2. Extend top leg and lift it as high as possible.  3. Lower the leg back down with control.  4. Keep hips elevated throughout.

Name: Floor Wiper
Description: 1. Lie flat on your back with arms extended out for support.  2. Raise legs vertically.  3. Slowly lower them to one side without touching the floor.  4. Bring them back up and repeat on the other side.

Name: Prison Sit-Up
Description: 1. Sit with knees bent and hands behind your head.  2. Perform a controlled sit-up without using momentum.  3. Keep elbows wide and core engaged.  4. Lower back down slowly.

Name: Plank Alternating Hip-Dip
Description: 1. Start in a forearm plank position.  2. Rotate hips and dip one side toward the floor.  3. Return to center and switch sides.  4. Keep core tight and movement controlled.

Name: Alternating Front Kick
Description: 1. Stand tall with fists raised in front of your chest.  2. Kick one leg forward while keeping your torso upright.  3. Lower leg and switch sides.  4. Keep core engaged.

Name: Feet-Elevated Bench Side Plank
Description: 1. Lie on your side with your feet elevated on a bench.  2. Place forearm on the floor and lift your hips into a side plank.  3. Keep your body in a straight line.  4. Hold, then switch sides.

Name: Decline Abs
Description: 1. Lie back on a decline bench with feet anchored.  2. Cross arms over chest or place hands behind head.  3. Perform a sit-up by lifting your torso.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Cross-Body Sit-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and hands behind your head.  2. Sit up while twisting your torso to bring your right elbow toward your left knee.  3. Return to the starting position.  4. Alternate sides with each rep

Name: Hip-Dip
Description: 1. Begin in a forearm plank position.  2. Rotate your hips to the right and dip them close to the ground.  3. Return to center, then dip to the left.  4. Keep your abs engaged and movements controlled.

Name: Alternating Single-Leg Pike
Description: 1. Start in a downward dog position.  2. Lift your right leg high toward the ceiling.  3. Lower the leg and repeat on the left side.  4. Keep your core tight and movement smooth.

Name: Straight Plank Hand Tap to Shoulder Tap
Description: 1. Begin in a straight-arm plank position.  2. Tap your right hand to the floor in front of you.  3. Return and tap your right hand to your left shoulder.  4. Alternate hands.  5. Keep hips steady throughout.

Name: Alternating Diagonal Knee Pull-In
Description: 1. Begin in a high plank position.  2. Drive your right knee toward your left elbow.  3. Return to plank and switch legs.  4. Maintain a tight core and straight back.

Name: Elbow Plank with Step-Out
Description: 1. Begin in a forearm plank position.  2. Step your right foot out to the side.  3. Return it to center and repeat with the left foot.  4. Keep your torso still and hips level.

Name: Hands-Elevated Straight Plank Pike
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank with hands on a bench or step.  2. Push your hips up toward the ceiling into a pike position.  3. Lower back into plank.  4. Keep your core engaged.

Name: Diagonal Right Leg Step-Out to Right Knee-Up
Description: 1. Stand tall and step your right leg diagonally behind you.  2. Push off the back foot and bring your right knee up toward your chest.  3. Return to starting position.  4. Repeat for reps before switching sides.

Name: Side Plank Hip Drop
Description: 1. Get into a side plank position on your elbow.  2. Lower your hip to just above the floor.  3. Raise back up to the plank.  4. Keep your core tight.

Name: Squat with Alternating Side Leg Raise
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart.  2. Perform a bodyweight squat.  3. As you rise, lift your right leg to the side.  4. Alternate legs with each squat.

Name: Side Lunge Cross-Body Heel-Touch
Description: 1. Step your right leg out to a side lunge.  2. Reach your left hand across to touch your right heel.  3. Push off and return to standing.  4. Repeat on the opposite side.

Name: Straight Plank Pike
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank position.  2. Lift your hips up toward the ceiling into a pike position.  3. Lower back down slowly.  4. Engage your core throughout.

Name: Side Kick
Description: 1. Stand tall with hands in front of chest.  2. Shift your weight to your left leg.  3. Kick your right leg out to the side.  4. Lower it down with control and repeat.

Name: Crab Reach to Crab Kick
Description: 1. Sit in a crab position with hands behind you and hips lifted.  2. Reach your left arm across your body while lifting your hips.  3. Return to crab and kick your right leg up.  4. Alternate sides.

Name: Glute Bridge Step-Out
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet hip-width apart.  2. Lift hips into a bridge.  3. Step one foot out to the side, then return.  4. Alternate legs while keeping hips lifted.

Name: Single-Leg Inchworm
Description: 1. Stand on one leg and reach your hands toward the floor.  2. Walk your hands forward into a plank.  3. Walk hands back and stand up.  4. Switch legs after reps.

Name: Boat Pull-Over
Description: 1. Sit in boat pose with legs raised and core tight.  2. Hold a light weight or object overhead.  3. Pull it slowly down toward your knees.  4. Return to overhead.

Name: Lunge with Overhead Reach
Description: 1. Step forward into a lunge.  2. Reach both arms overhead.  3. Hold briefly, then return to standing.  4. Alternate legs.

Name: Monster Walk
Description: 1. Place a resistance band around your thighs.  2. Stand in a half-squat position.  3. Step forward diagonally with one foot, then the other.  4. Keep tension in the band.  5. Perform 10–12 steps forward and back.

Name: Right Side Elbow Plank with Left Leg Swing
Description: 1. Get into a right-side elbow plank.  2. Raise and swing your left leg forward and backward.  3. Keep hips stable and core tight.

Name: Left Side Elbow Plank with Right Leg Swing
Description: 1. Begin in a left-side elbow plank position.  2. Lift your right leg and swing it forward and backward.  3. Keep hips steady and core engaged.  5. Switch sides if desired.

Name: Straight Plank with Alternating Diagonal Sit-Back
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank position.  2. Push your hips back diagonally toward your right heel.  3. Return to center, then push toward the left heel.  4. Keep arms extended and core tight.

Name: Close push-up to wide push-up
Description: 1. Begin in a push-up position with hands close together.  2. Perform a close-grip push-up.  3. Walk hands outward to wide position.  4. Perform a wide push-up.

Name: Scapular push-up
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank.  2. Without bending elbows, squeeze shoulder blades together.  3. Push them apart to return to starting position.  4. Maintain a straight back. 5. Perform slow reps.

Name: Supine Double Pike
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended and arms overhead.  2. Simultaneously lift your arms and legs to meet in the middle.  3. Reach hands toward toes in a pike position.  4. Lower slowly.

Name: Single-Leg Right Pike
Description: 1. Begin in downward dog position.  2. Lift your right leg high, forming a pike shape.  3. Hold briefly, then lower.  4. Keep core tight and hips square.  5. Repeat, then switch legs.

Name: Single-Leg Left Pike
Description: 1. Begin in downward dog position.  2. Lift your left leg high, maintaining a pike shape.  3. Hold briefly, then return to start.  4. Keep core engaged.

Name: Isometric Wipers
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms outstretched and legs raised.  2. Keep legs straight and rotate them slowly side to side.  3. Pause at each side for a second.  4. Maintain control throughout.

Name: Feet-elevated bench dip
Description: 1. Place hands on a bench behind you, feet elevated on another surface.  2. Lower your body by bending your elbows.  3. Push back up to starting position.  4. Keep elbows close to your body.

Name: Chair Dip
Description: 1. Sit on the edge of a sturdy chair with hands beside your hips.  2. Slide forward and lower your body by bending elbows.  3. Push back up to straighten arms.  4. Keep feet flat or legs extended.

Name: Wall Shoulder Tap
Description: 1. Face a wall and assume a standing or inclined plank.  2. Lift one hand to tap the opposite shoulder.  3. Alternate sides.  4. Keep body straight and hips stable.

Name: Return Push from Stance
Description: 1. Begin in a split stance with arms extended forward.  2. Push off the front foot and return to standing.  3. Control the movement and keep posture upright.  4. Alternate sides.

Name: Forward lunge
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Step forward with one leg and lower until both knees are at 90°.  3. Push off the front foot to return.  4. Alternate legs.

Name: Single-leg glute bridge
Description: 1. Lie on your back with one knee bent, other leg extended.  2. Lift your hips by pressing through the heel.  3. Squeeze glutes at the top.  4. Lower slowly and repeat.

Name: Right Side-Kick
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Shift weight to your left foot.  3. Kick your right leg out to the side.  4. Return with control.

Name: Alternating Donkey Kick
Description: 1. Get on all fours with knees under hips.  2. Kick your right leg upward, keeping knee bent.  3. Lower and switch legs.  4. Keep your core tight.

Name: Alternating Side Iron Cross
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms extended.  2. Lift one leg and rotate it across your body toward the opposite hand.  3. Return and repeat with the other leg.  4. Keep shoulders down.

Name: Left Side-Kick
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Shift weight to your right foot.  3. Kick your left leg out to the side.  4. Lower with control.

Name: Lateral Lunge
Description: 1. Stand tall, feet hip-width apart.  2. Step out to the side with your right leg, lowering into a lunge.  3. Push off and return to center.  4. Alternate sides.

Name: Squat with Alternating Leg Extension
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Perform a squat.  3. As you rise, extend one leg straight out in front.  4. Alternate legs each rep.

Name: Alternating Side Lunge
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet together.  2. Step out to the right, bending the knee while keeping the left leg straight.  3. Push back to center and repeat on the left side.  4. Keep your chest lifted and core engaged.

Name: Single-Leg Deadlift Walk
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Hinge at the hips while lifting one leg straight behind you.  3. Reach toward the ground with both hands.  4. Step forward and repeat on the other leg in a walking motion.

Name: Natural Glute Ham Raise
Description: 1. Kneel on the floor with ankles anchored.  2. Slowly lower your torso forward from the knees while keeping your back straight.  3. Engage hamstrings and glutes to return to upright position.  4. Use arms for assistance if needed.

Name: Feet-elevated push-up
Description: 1. Place feet on a bench or platform and hands on the ground in push-up position.  2. Lower chest toward the floor, keeping elbows close to the body.  3. Push back up to starting position.  4. Maintain a strong core throughout.

Name: Eiffel Tower Leg Raise
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs straight and arms extended overhead in a “V” shape.  2. Raise legs upward while bringing arms toward toes.  3. Keep core tight and lower with control.  4. Return to starting position.

Name: Half Turkish Get-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with one arm extended holding weight and same-side knee bent.  2. Push through the foot to lift your torso onto the opposite elbow.  3. Extend to the hand while keeping the arm vertical.  4. Reverse the movement to return.

Name: Plank Fire Hydrants
Description: 1. Start in a forearm plank position.  2. Lift one leg out to the side, keeping knee bent.  3. Lower it back with control.  4. Alternate sides while maintaining plank form.

Name: Side Plank Lateral Raise
Description: 1. Begin in a side plank with your top hand holding a dumbbell.  2. Raise the dumbbell laterally to shoulder height.  3. Lower slowly.  4. Maintain body alignment and core engagement.

Name: Seated Scissor Kick
Description: 1. Sit with hands slightly behind you, legs extended off the ground.  2. Alternate crossing your legs over and under each other in a scissor motion.  3. Keep your core tight and back straight throughout.

Name: Otis-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and a weight held at your chest.  2. Use your abs to sit all the way up, keeping arms straight.  3. Return to lying position with control.

Name: Shoulder Tap to Hand Tap
Description: 1. Start in a plank position.  2. Tap one hand to the opposite shoulder.  3. Then reach down and tap the opposite hand.  4. Alternate sides, keeping hips stable.

Name: Inchworm
Description: 1. Stand tall, then bend at the hips and walk your hands forward into a plank.  2. Perform a brief hold, then walk feet toward hands.  3. Return to standing and repeat.

Name: Step-up with knee raise
Description: 1. Stand in front of a bench or platform.  2. Step up with one foot and drive the opposite knee upward.  3. Step down and alternate legs.  4. Keep your torso upright.

Name: Side Kick-Through
Description: 1. Start in a tabletop position on hands and feet.  2. Rotate your hips and kick one leg under and through to the opposite side.  3. Return to center and switch sides.

Name: Single-Leg V-Up
Description: 1. Lie flat with arms extended overhead.  2. Lift one leg and reach both hands toward the foot.  3. Lower and repeat on the opposite leg.  4. Keep core activated throughout.

Name: Single-Kettlebell Windmill
Description: 1. Hold a kettlebell overhead in one hand.  2. Pivot feet slightly and slide the opposite hand down your leg while pushing hips out.  3. Keep the kettlebell arm vertical.  4. Return to standing.

Name: Elbow Plank Saw
Description: 1. Begin in an elbow plank position.  2. Rock your body forward and backward using your toes.  3. Keep your body straight and core tight throughout the motion.

Name: Feet-Elevated Straight Plank Toe-Tap Series
Description: 1. Get into a straight-arm plank with feet elevated on a bench.  2. Tap one foot to the side, then return.  3. Alternate sides.  4. Maintain a tight core and flat back.

Name: Spider crawl
Description: 1. Begin in a plank position.  2. Step one foot outside the same-side hand.  3. Alternate steps forward while keeping hips low and hands on the ground.

Name: Elbow Plank to Stacked Plank Hip Drop
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank.  2. Transition to a side plank by stacking your feet and rotating your torso.  3. Drop the hips slightly, then lift them back.  4. Return to center and switch sides.

Name: Hands-Elevated Hill Climber
Description: 1. Place hands on an elevated surface in plank position.  2. Drive one knee toward the chest.  3. Alternate legs quickly while keeping core tight.  4. Maintain a flat back throughout.

Name: Stair Toe Tap
Description: 1. Stand in front of a stair or low platform.  2. Rapidly tap one foot on the stair, then switch feet.  3. Continue alternating at a steady pace.  4. Keep your chest lifted and core engaged.

Name: Feet-Elevated Plank Reach
Description: 1. Begin in a straight-arm plank with feet elevated.  2. Reach one hand forward without rotating the hips.  3. Return and alternate sides.  4. Maintain full-body tension and control.

Name: Alternating Rolling Elbow Plank
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank position.  2. Rotate to one side into a side plank.  3. Return to center and roll to the opposite side.  4. Repeat while keeping core tight.

Name: Step-up with knee raise
Description: 1. Stand in front of a step or platform.  2. Step up with one leg and drive the opposite knee up.  3. Step down and alternate legs.  4. Keep your torso upright and controlled.

Name: Straight Plank Donkey Kick
Description: 1. Get into a straight-arm plank position.  2. Lift one leg and kick the heel upward.  3. Lower and switch legs.  4. Maintain tight core and avoid arching the back.

Name: V-up
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs straight and arms overhead.  2. Simultaneously lift legs and arms to form a “V” shape.  3. Reach hands toward toes.  4. Lower with control and repeat.

Name: Pillar-to-Plank
Description: 1. Start in a high kneeling “pillar” position.  2. Step one foot out at a time into plank.  3. Reverse to return to kneeling.  4. Keep movements controlled and abs engaged.

Name: Knee-In to V-Out
Description: 1. Begin in a seated position with hands behind you.  2. Pull knees to chest, then extend legs out in a V shape.  3. Return and repeat.  4. Keep back straight and abs engaged.

Name: Plank Up-Down
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank.  2. Lower one arm at a time into an elbow plank.  3. Push back up one arm at a time.  4. Alternate lead arms and keep body stable.

Name: Side V-Up
Description: 1. Lie on your side with legs stacked and one arm extended.  2. Lift both legs and upper body, reaching toward your feet.  3. Lower with control.  4. Repeat on the same side before switching.

Name: Tuck-Up Get-Up
Description: 1. Sit on the ground with knees bent and feet lifted.  2. Tuck knees in, then extend legs forward.  3. Roll up to standing or high seated position.  4. Reverse with control.

Name: Flutter Kick
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended.  2. Lift legs slightly off the ground and alternate quick kicks.  3. Keep core engaged and lower back flat.  4. Continue without letting feet touch the floor.

Name: Ab bicycle
Description: 1. Lie on your back with hands behind your head.  2. Bring one elbow toward the opposite knee while extending the other leg.  3. Alternate sides in a pedaling motion.  4. Engage abs and avoid pulling the neck.

Name: Feet-Elevated Hand Tap
Description: 1. Assume a straight-arm plank with feet elevated.  2. Tap one hand to the opposite shoulder or floor.  3. Alternate taps while maintaining a stable core.  4. Keep body straight and hips level.

Name: In-Out Straight Plank
Description: 1. Begin in a straight-arm plank.  2. Jump or step feet apart, then back together.  3. Keep hips low and core tight.  4. Maintain a steady pace with control.

Name: Bicycle
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees lifted.  2. Pedal your legs in a bicycle motion while twisting your torso to touch opposite elbow to knee.  3. Continue alternating.  4. Keep your abs engaged.

Name: Elbow Plank to Walk-Up Pike
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank.  2. Walk feet toward hands, lifting hips into a pike.  3. Walk back to plank.  4. Keep core tight and movements smooth.

Name: Hovering Panther Core Stabilizer
Description: 1. Begin on hands and knees with toes tucked.  2. Lift knees slightly off the ground into a hover.  3. Hold this position, keeping back flat and core tight.  4. Breathe steadily.

Name: Elbow Plank Pike
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank.  2. Raise your hips toward the ceiling into a pike position.  3. Lower back to plank slowly.  4. Keep legs straight and core activated.

Name: Elbow Plank Alternating Pike
Description: 1. Start in an elbow plank position.  2. Lift your hips into a pike while bringing one foot in slightly.  3. Return to plank and repeat with the opposite leg.  4. Maintain core tension throughout.

Name: Alternating Leg 7-Up Crunch
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs straight.  2. Raise one leg and crunch upward, reaching both arms toward the raised leg.  3. Lower and switch sides.  4. Keep movement controlled and core engaged.

Name: Alternating Diagonal Straight Plank
Description: 1. Begin in a straight-arm plank.  2. Lift one arm and opposite leg simultaneously in a diagonal direction.  3. Return and alternate sides.  4. Maintain balance and core stability.

Name: Hands Elevated Push-Up
Description: 1. Place hands on an elevated surface.  2. Lower your chest toward the surface.  3. Push back up to starting position.  4. Keep body straight and core braced.

Name: Bench dip
Description: 1. Sit on the edge of a bench with hands gripping behind hips.  2. Slide hips off and lower your body by bending elbows.  3. Push back up to extend arms.  4. Keep your back close to the bench.

Name: Bodyweight triceps press
Description: 1. Start in a plank with hands closer than shoulder-width.  2. Bend elbows to lower body, keeping them tucked.  3. Press back up using triceps.  4. Maintain body alignment throughout.

Name: Neck Bridge Supine
Description: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.  2. Push through your feet and lift your hips, arching the neck backward.  3. Rest weight gently on your head.  4. Keep the movement controlled and neck supported.

Name: Reverse lunge
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet together.  2. Step one foot back and lower into a lunge.  3. Return to standing and alternate legs.  4. Keep front knee aligned with ankle.

Name: Neck Bridge Prone
Description: 1. Lie on your stomach with hands near shoulders.  2. Push your torso up and place the top of your head on the floor.  3. Press into the floor and raise your body, arching your back.  4. Keep tension through your neck and spine.

Name: Bodyweight squat
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.  2. Lower hips down and back into a squat.  3. Keep chest up and knees behind toes.  4. Return to standing.

Name: Curtsy lunge
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart.  2. Step one leg diagonally behind the other and lower into a lunge.  3. Return to standing and alternate legs.  4. Keep torso upright.

Name: Sumo Squat
Description: 1. Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width, toes slightly out.  2. Lower your hips straight down.  3. Keep chest lifted and knees tracking over toes.  4. Rise back up with control.

Name: Bootstrapper Squat
Description: 1. Begin in a deep squat, grabbing your toes.  2. Extend your legs to raise hips while keeping hands on toes.  3. Return to deep squat and repeat.  4. Maintain a flat back.

Name: Spider Lunge
Description: 1. Begin in a plank position.  2. Step one foot outside your hand and lower hips.  3. Return and switch sides.  4. Keep back flat and core tight.

Name: Crossover Reverse Lunge
Description: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.  2. Step one leg behind and across your body.  3. Lower into a lunge and return.  4. Alternate sides.

Name: Prisoner Squat
Description: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hands behind your head.  2. Lower into a squat while keeping elbows back.  3. Push through heels to return up.  4. Keep torso upright.

Name: Alligator Crawl
Description: 1. Get into a low push-up position.  2. Move forward by stepping hands and dragging feet.  3. Keep hips low and core tight.  4. Move slowly with control.

Name: Breakdancer
Description: 1. Begin in tabletop position with knees hovering.  2. Rotate and kick one leg under your body.  3. Return and switch sides.  4. Use arms and core for balance.

Name: Push-Up Roll Out
Description: 1. Perform a push-up.  2. At the top, shift your weight and rotate to one side.  3. Return and repeat, rolling to the other side.  4. Keep core tight.

Name: Hand-Elevated Walk-Over Push-Up
Description: 1. Place one hand on an elevated surface.  2. Do a push-up, then walk hands across to switch sides.  3. Repeat the motion.  4. Keep your body aligned throughout.

Name: Feet-Elevated Up-Down Plank
Description: 1. Start in a feet-elevated straight-arm plank.  2. Lower one arm at a time to elbow plank.  3. Push back up to straight-arm plank.  4. Alternate lead arms while maintaining core engagement.

Name: Feet-Elevated Plank with Shoulder Tap
Description: 1. Begin in a feet-elevated plank.  2. Tap opposite shoulder with one hand while stabilizing with the other.  3. Alternate sides.  4. Keep hips steady and core tight.

Name: Feet-Elevated Up-Down Elbow Plank
Description: 1. Start in a feet-elevated elbow plank.  2. Push up to straight-arm plank one hand at a time.  3. Lower back to elbows.  4. Maintain tight core throughout.

Name: Feet-Elevated Plank Pike Pull
Description: 1. Begin in feet-elevated plank position.  2. Pull hips upward into a pike shape.  3. Return to plank position.  4. Engage abs and avoid arching back.

Name: Straight Plank Pike to Renegade Row
Description: 1. Start in straight-arm plank.  2. Perform a pike by lifting hips.  3. Return to plank and perform a row with one arm.  4. Alternate arms and repeat.

Name: Alternating Hip Drop to Push-Up
Description: 1. Start in elbow plank.  2. Drop one hip toward the floor.  3. Return to center and perform a push-up.  4. Alternate sides with each rep.

Name: Groiners
Description: 1. Begin in plank position.  2. Jump both feet outside your hands.  3. Keep hips low and back flat.  4. Return to plank and repeat.

Name: Elbow Plank Ninja
Description: 1. Start in elbow plank.  2. Jump both feet forward under your body like a ninja squat.  3. Jump back to plank.  4. Keep movements sharp and controlled.

Name: Spider Plank Jack
Description: 1. Begin in straight-arm plank.  2. Jump feet apart and bring one knee toward the outside elbow.  3. Return to plank and switch sides.  4. Maintain a steady pace.

Name: Cross-Body Mountain Climber
Description: 1. Start in plank position.  2. Drive one knee toward the opposite elbow.  3. Alternate legs quickly.  4. Keep shoulders over hands.

Name: Ninja Knee Straight Plank
Description: 1. Start in straight-arm plank.  2. Jump both feet forward, bending knees under body.  3. Return to plank position.  4. Land softly and stay controlled.

Name: Floor Jack
Description: 1. Lie on your back with arms and legs extended.  2. Simultaneously open arms and legs out wide.  3. Bring them back together.  4. Keep core engaged.

Name: Towel Wide Hill Climber
Description: 1. Start in plank with feet on towels or sliders.  2. Slide one foot forward and outward to the side.  3. Alternate legs.  4. Keep upper body steady.

Name: Straight Plank Split Jack
Description: 1. Begin in straight-arm plank.  2. Jump legs apart, then back together.  3. Keep core tight and back flat.  4. Avoid letting hips rise.

Name: Straight Plank Right-Left Jack to Split Jack
Description: 1. Start in straight-arm plank.  2. Perform a side-to-side jack, then a split jack.  3. Alternate the pattern.  4. Maintain strong core engagement.

Name: Straight Plank Jack
Description: 1. Start in a straight-arm plank.  2. Jump feet out and in like a jumping jack.  3. Keep hips level and core tight.  4. Control movement.

Name: Squat Tap to Hop
Description: 1. Begin in a squat position.  2. Tap the floor with one hand.  3. Jump upward, then return to squat.  4. Repeat alternating sides.

Name: Plank Walk-Out
Description: 1. Stand tall, then bend at hips and walk hands out to plank.  2. Hold briefly, then walk hands back to standing.  3. Keep core engaged throughout.

Name: Frog Kick
Description: 1. Start in elbow plank.  2. Jump both feet forward outside your elbows.  3. Jump back to starting plank.  4. Land softly and control the motion.

Name: Push Up to Side Plank
Description: 1. Perform a push-up.  2. Rotate into a side plank on one arm.  3. Return to center, do another push-up, and switch sides.  4. Keep movements fluid and core engaged.

Name: Chest Push-Up To Isometric Hold
Description: 1. Start in plank and lower into a push-up.  2. Hold the bottom position briefly.  3. Push back up to plank.  4. Keep core tight and back flat.

Name: Push-up to Down Dog
Description: 1. Perform a push-up.  2. Shift hips back into Downward Dog.  3. Return to plank and repeat.  4. Keep shoulders active and spine long.

Name: Alternating Curtsy Lunge with High Knee
Description: 1. Step one leg diagonally behind into a curtsy lunge.  2. Push off and lift the knee up in front.  3. Alternate sides.  4. Engage core for balance.

Name: Straight-Legged Bicycle
Description: 1. Lie on your back with legs extended.  2. Lift shoulder blades and alternate straight-leg crossovers.  3. Reach elbow to opposite leg.  4. Keep movements slow and controlled.

Name: Plank Push-Up
Description: 1. Begin in elbow plank.  2. Push up to straight-arm plank one arm at a time.  3. Lower back to elbows.  4. Alternate lead arm each time.

Name: Dive-Bomber
Description: 1. Start in Downward Dog.  2. Lower chest and scoop forward into Upward Dog.  3. Reverse the movement to return.  4. Flow smoothly through the motion.

Name: Inverted Row
Description: 1. Lie under a low bar or sturdy surface.  2. Grab the bar with an overhand grip.  3. Pull chest toward the bar.  4. Lower back down with control.

Name: Landmine Twist
Description: 1. Hold one end of a barbell in both hands.  2. Rotate the bar side-to-side at shoulder level.  3. Keep hips stable and rotate through the torso.  4. Engage core throughout.

Name: Sumo Squat Pulse
Description: 1. Stand with feet wide and toes turned out.  2. Lower into a squat and pulse up and down.  3. Stay low and keep chest lifted.  4. Maintain tension in thighs and glutes.

Name: Alternating Up-Down Plank to Push-Up
Description: 1. Start in elbow plank.  2. Push up to straight-arm plank and perform a push-up.  3. Return to elbow plank.  4. Alternate leading arm.

Name: Forward-To-Reverse Lunge
Description: 1. Step one leg forward into a lunge.  2. Push back and immediately step the same leg into a reverse lunge.  3. Alternate legs.  4. Keep torso upright.

Name: Prisoner Reverse Lunge
Description: 1. Stand with hands behind your head.  2. Step back into a lunge.  3. Push back to standing.  4. Alternate sides while keeping chest up.

Name: Lunge kick
Description: 1. Step back into a reverse lunge.  2. Push off front foot and kick the back leg forward.  3. Return to lunge and repeat.  4. Alternate sides.

Name: Down Up
Description: 1. Begin in standing position.  2. Squat down and place hands on the floor.  3. Jump feet back to plank, then return and stand.  4. Repeat quickly with control.

Name: Walking lunge
Description: 1. Step forward into a lunge.  2. Bring rear leg forward into next lunge.  3. Keep alternating legs while moving forward.  4. Maintain upright posture.

Name: Walking Lunge with Twist
