Description: 1. Step forward into a lunge.  2. Rotate torso toward the front leg.  3. Return to center and step forward.  4. Alternate legs and twists.

Name: Alternating Split Squat
Description: 1. Start in a split stance.  2. Lower into a squat, then switch legs mid-air.  3. Land softly in opposite split stance.  4. Repeat while maintaining control.

Name: Straight-arm plank with kick-back
Description: 1. Begin in plank.  2. Lift one leg and extend it backward.  3. Lower and switch sides.  4. Keep hips level and abs tight.

Name: Traveling Bear Crawl
Description: 1. Start on all fours with knees slightly off ground.  2. Move opposite hand and foot forward.  3. Continue crawling while keeping back flat.  4. Stay low and controlled.

Name: Ab Wheel Roll-Out
Description: 1. Kneel with hands on ab wheel handles.  2. Slowly roll forward, extending your body.  3. Pull back to starting position.  4. Engage core and avoid arching back.

Name: Feet-Elevated Hill Climber
Description: 1. Place feet on a bench or elevated surface in plank.  2. Drive knees toward chest alternately.  3. Keep core tight and back flat.  4. Move with control and speed.

Name: Right Hip Drop Push-Up
Description: 1. Begin in a plank.  2. Lower into a push-up while dipping right hip toward the ground.  3. Return to start.  4. Keep abs engaged throughout.

Name: Left Hip Drop Push-Up
Description: 1. Begin in a plank.  2. Lower into a push-up while dipping left hip toward the ground.  3. Push back up.  4. Maintain plank alignment.

Name: Linear Acceleration Wall Drill
Description: 1. Stand at a 45-degree angle facing a wall.  2. Drive knees up one at a time rapidly.  3. Use quick, powerful motions.  4. Maintain strong posture.

Name: Line-Drill Foot Work
Description: 1. Stand with a line beneath your feet.  2. Rapidly step over and back across the line.  3. Stay light on your toes.  4. Focus on quick feet.

Name: Wide Mountain Climber
Description: 1. Start in plank.  2. Drive knees outside toward elbows alternately.  3. Keep hips low and core tight.  4. Maintain a quick tempo.

Name: Bench Mountain Climber
Description: 1. Place hands on a bench and assume plank.  2. Alternate driving knees to chest.  3. Keep upper body stable.  4. Move legs quickly.

Name: Hill Climber
Description: 1. Start in plank.  2. Drive knees toward chest in a running motion.  3. Maintain strong core engagement.  4. Keep shoulders over wrists.

Name: Hands-Elevated Split Jack
Description: 1. Place hands on an elevated surface.  2. Jump feet apart and together quickly.  3. Keep body stable.  4. Focus on fast footwork.

Name: Ninja Crawl
Description: 1. Begin in low bear crawl position.  2. Move forward with low, quiet steps.  3. Stay close to the ground.  4. Engage your core and move with control.

Name: Wide Hill Climber
Description: 1. Get into a wide plank.  2. Drive knees out to the side toward elbows.  3. Alternate legs rapidly.  4. Keep hips low and steady.

Name: Plank Jack
Description: 1. Begin in plank.  2. Jump feet out wide and then back together.  3. Keep core tight and back flat.  4. Move rhythmically and with control.

Name: Lateral cone hop
Description: 1. Stand beside a cone or object.  2. Hop laterally over it with both feet.  3. Land softly and continue hopping side to side.  4. Maintain balance.

Name: Lateral Speed Step
Description: 1. Stand beside a step or line.  2. Step quickly over and back with both feet.  3. Keep knees bent and body low.  4. Focus on speed and control.

Name: Slow Jog
Description: 1. Begin jogging in place or forward.  2. Keep light on your feet.  3. Maintain a relaxed rhythm.  4. Breathe evenly and stay loose.

Name: Quick Leap
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart.  2. Leap forward quickly.  3. Land softly and reset.  4. Use arms for momentum.

Name: Lateral Shuffle
Description: 1. Bend knees slightly and assume athletic stance.  2. Shuffle side to side.  3. Stay low and quick.  4. Keep feet off the ground as much as possible.

Name: Chest Push-Up
Description: 1. Get into a plank with hands under shoulders.  2. Lower chest toward the floor.  3. Push back up.  4. Keep body in a straight line.

Name: Hand-release push-up
Description: 1. Lower body all the way to the ground in push-up position.  2. Lift hands briefly off the floor.  3. Place them back and push up.  4. Maintain core engagement.

Name: Straight Plank Squat Thrust
Description: 1. Begin in a plank.  2. Jump feet forward toward hands into squat position.  3. Jump feet back to plank.  4. Keep back flat and controlled.

Name: Towel Reverse Plank Jack
Description: 1. Sit and extend legs with hands behind hips.  2. Lift hips into a reverse plank.  3. Jump feet apart and together while maintaining position.  4. Keep hips elevated and core tight.

Name: Bear Crawl Fire Feet
Description: 1. Start in a bear crawl with knees off the floor.  2. Rapidly alternate foot taps in place.  3. Stay low and controlled.  4. Keep back flat and core engaged.

Name: Hands Down Heel Click
Description: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart.  2. Jump and click heels together in air.  3. Tap hands down as you land.  4. Reset and repeat.

Name: Ninja Knee Hill Climber
Description: 1. Start in plank position.  2. Drive one knee toward opposite elbow.  3. Alternate quickly with control.  4. Keep shoulders over wrists and hips low.

Name: Feet-Elevated Couch Hill Climber
Description: 1. Place feet on couch or bench in plank.  2. Drive knees alternately toward chest.  3. Maintain strong core and flat back.  4. Move with quick, stable rhythm.

Name: Decline Push-Up
Description: 1. Position feet on elevated surface and hands on floor.  2. Lower chest toward ground.  3. Push back up to plank.  4. Keep body in a straight line.

Name: Close push-up to wide push-up
Description: 1. Begin in close-grip push-up position.  2. Lower chest, then move hands wider.  3. Perform wide push-up.  4. Alternate between close and wide.

Name: Side-to-side push-up
Description: 1. Get into wide push-up position.  2. Shift body weight to one side and lower.  3. Push up and repeat to the other side.  4. Maintain plank form throughout.

Name: Spiderman Push-Up
Description: 1. Begin in push-up position.  2. Lower body while bringing knee to same-side elbow.  3. Return to start and switch sides.  4. Keep movement smooth and controlled.

Name: Cross-over push-up
Description: 1. Start in staggered hand position.  2. Perform push-up, then cross hands to switch position.  3. Repeat on opposite side.  4. Engage core and keep steady.

Name: Scissors Jump
Description: 1. Stand in a lunge position.  2. Jump and switch legs mid-air.  3. Land softly in opposite lunge.  4. Use arms for balance.

Name: Jump Lunge
Description: 1. Begin in a lunge stance.  2. Explode up and switch legs mid-air.  3. Land in lunge on opposite side.  4. Maintain upright torso and balance.

Name: Hands-Elevated Burpee
Description: 1. Place hands on bench or surface.  2. Jump feet back to plank.  3. Jump feet forward and stand.  4. Add a jump if desired.

Name: Cross-Over Jack
Description: 1. Stand tall with arms at sides.  2. Jump feet apart while swinging arms outward.  3. Jump feet in, crossing one foot over.  4. Alternate crossing legs.

Name: Butt Tap to Jump
Description: 1. Lower into a deep squat.  2. Tap surface or go low enough to mimic tapping.  3. Explode into a jump.  4. Land softly and repeat.

Name: Slide Jump Shot
Description: 1. Shuffle sideways quickly.  2. Stop and perform a jump shot motion.  3. Repeat in opposite direction.  4. Keep movement fluid and athletic.

Name: Defensive Slide
Description: 1. Assume low athletic stance.  2. Shuffle quickly side to side.  3. Do not let feet cross.  4. Keep chest up and arms ready.

Name: Square Hop
Description: 1. Imagine or draw a square on floor.  2. Hop with both feet to each corner in order.  3. Land softly and maintain rhythm.  4. Reverse direction after a round.

Name: Speed Skater
Description: 1. Leap laterally from one leg to the other.  2. Swing opposite arm across body.  3. Land lightly and stay balanced.  4. Keep pace brisk and steady.

Name: Seal Jack
Description: 1. Stand with arms extended in front.  2. Jump feet apart while swinging arms wide.  3. Jump back to start.  4. Keep movement smooth and rhythmic.

Name: Hands-Elevated Jack to Split Jump
Description: 1. Place hands on an elevated surface in plank.  2. Jump feet out and in like a jack.  3. Then jump into a split stance.  4. Alternate split legs and repeat pattern.

Name: Lateral Bounding Hop
Description: 1. Stand on one leg.  2. Leap sideways to land on opposite leg.  3. Swing arms for balance and power.  4. Repeat side to side in rhythm.

Name: Staggered push-up
Description: 1. Begin in plank with one hand forward, one back.  2. Lower chest to floor.  3. Push back up and switch hand positions.  4. Keep body aligned and core tight.

Name: Frog push-up
Description: 1. Start in push-up position.  2. Lower chest while bending knees out to sides.  3. Return to plank as you push up.  4. Keep movement controlled.

Name: Alternating Staggered Push-Up
Description: 1. Start in staggered push-up position.  2. Perform push-up.  3. Walk hands to switch stagger.  4. Repeat, alternating sides each time.

Name: Pike Push-Up
Description: 1. Begin in downward dog position.  2. Lower head toward the ground by bending elbows.  3. Push back up to start.  4. Focus on shoulders and keep core engaged.

Name: Triceps Push-Up
Description: 1. Start in a plank with hands under shoulders.  2. Lower body keeping elbows tight to sides.  3. Push up without flaring elbows.  4. Maintain straight body line.

Name: Burpee to Forward Lunge
Description: 1. Perform a burpee.  2. As you rise, step into a forward lunge.  3. Return to start and repeat with opposite leg.  4. Keep movement continuous.

Name: Right Side Diagonal Burpee
Description: 1. Begin standing.  2. Jump feet back diagonally to the right into a plank.  3. Perform push-up if desired.  4. Return to stand and repeat.

Name: Typewriter push-up
Description: 1. Start in wide push-up position.  2. Lower chest and shift weight side to side.  3. Push back up at end of movement.  4. Stay low and controlled.

Name: Fast Feet To Push-Up
Description: 1. Do quick high steps in place.  2. Drop into push-up position.  3. Perform one push-up.  4. Jump back to feet and repeat.

Name: Hurdle Hops
Description: 1. Stand beside a low object or line.  2. Jump laterally over it with both feet.  3. Land softly and repeat.  4. Focus on height and control.

Name: Side Hop-Sprint
Description: 1. Perform a lateral hop.  2. Immediately sprint forward a few steps.  3. Stop and repeat from new side.  4. Use strong arms and quick feet.

Name: Sprawl
Description: 1. Start standing.  2. Drop to the floor quickly, chest down like a burpee.  3. Pop back up to feet.  4. Keep core tight and react quickly.

Name: Daisy Cutter
Description: 1. Start in a squat.  2. Reach one hand diagonally toward opposite foot.  3. Stand and switch sides.  4. Maintain squat depth throughout.

Name: Jumping Knee-Up
Description: 1. Stand tall.  2. Jump and drive one knee up high.  3. Land softly and repeat, alternating knees.  4. Swing arms for balance.

Name: Burpee
Description: 1. Squat down and place hands on floor.  2. Jump feet back to plank.  3. Jump feet forward and explode upward.  4. Land softly and repeat.

Name: High Knees
Description: 1. Jog in place, lifting knees high.  2. Pump arms in sync with legs.  3. Stay light on your feet.  4. Keep quick tempo and upright posture.

Name: Frogger
Description: 1. Begin in plank position.  2. Jump feet forward to outside of hands.  3. Keep chest lifted in squat.  4. Jump feet back to plank and repeat.

Name: Arms-Crossed Jump Squat
Description: 1. Start in a squat with arms crossed.  2. Jump up explosively.  3. Land back into squat with arms still crossed.  4. Keep chest up and back straight.

Name: Split Jump
Description: 1. Start in a lunge position.  2. Jump and switch legs mid-air.  3. Land softly into opposite lunge.  4. Keep chest up and knees aligned.

Name: Star Jump
Description: 1. Begin in a squat.  2. Jump explosively, spreading arms and legs wide.  3. Land softly back into squat.  4. Engage core for control.

Name: Jumping Jack
Description: 1. Stand with feet together, arms at sides.  2. Jump feet out while raising arms overhead.  3. Jump back to start.  4. Repeat rhythmically.

Name: Superhero Burpee
Description: 1. Do a full burpee.  2. At the top, jump forward in a superhero stance.  3. Return to stand.  4. Use power and control.

Name: Gorilla Burpee
Description: 1. Squat and place hands down.  2. Jump feet back into plank.  3. Jump feet outside hands and swing arms.  4. Stay low and repeat.

Name: Traveling High Knees to Squat Thrust
Description: 1. Run forward with high knees.  2. Drop into squat thrust.  3. Jump feet back and forward.  4. Stand and continue moving forward.

Name: Knee Tuck Jump
Description: 1. Stand tall.  2. Jump up and tuck both knees toward chest.  3. Land softly.  4. Use arms for power.

Name: Rocket Jump
Description: 1. Begin in squat.  2. Jump straight up with arms reaching high.  3. Land softly back into squat.  4. Explode upward each rep.

Name: Running Lunge
Description: 1. Start in lunge.  2. Jump and switch legs quickly.  3. Use arms to drive motion.  4. Land gently with control.

Name: In-Out Jump Squat
Description: 1. Start with feet together in squat.  2. Jump feet wide into another squat.  3. Jump back to narrow squat.  4. Keep chest lifted.

Name: Jumping Knee Up-Down
Description: 1. Start on knees.  2. Step or jump up to feet.  3. Jump with both knees up.  4. Return to knees and repeat.

Name: Wide Squat Thrust
Description: 1. Begin in wide squat.  2. Place hands down and jump feet back wide into plank.  3. Jump feet forward to wide squat.  4. Stay low and controlled.

Name: Vertical Mountain Climber
Description: 1. Stand tall.  2. Run in place with high knees.  3. Reach arms overhead as if climbing.  4. Move fast with strong posture.

Name: Tuck Jump with Knee Slap
Description: 1. Stand with arms at sides.  2. Jump and slap knees mid-air.  3. Land softly.  4. Reset and repeat with power.

Name: Football Up-Down
Description: 1. Shuffle feet quickly in place.  2. Drop to plank position.  3. Pop back up to fast feet.  4. Repeat rapidly.

Name: Burpee to Flying Jack
Description: 1. Do a burpee.  2. As you jump up, perform a jumping jack mid-air.  3. Land softly.  4. Return to burpee.

Name: Left Side Diagonal Burpee
Description: 1. Start standing.  2. Jump feet back diagonally to the left into plank.  3. Push-up optional.  4. Return and repeat.

Name: Reverse Burpee
Description: 1. Start standing.  2. Roll back onto your back.  3. Use momentum to roll forward to stand.  4. Jump or hop at the top.

Name: Burpee Tuck Jump
Description: 1. Perform a burpee.  2. At the top, jump with knees tucked.  3. Land softly.  4. Keep movement powerful and controlled.

Name: Tuck-Up Burpee
Description: 1. Do a burpee.  2. As you jump up, pull knees toward chest.  3. Land and continue.  4. Maintain rhythm and core control.

Name: Burpee with Belly Touch
Description: 1. Begin standing.  2. Drop into a push-up position, lower body fully to the ground.  3. Touch chest/belly to floor.  4. Push up, jump to feet, and jump vertically.

Name: Jumping rope
Description: 1. Hold rope handles with both hands.  2. Swing rope overhead and jump as it passes under feet.  3. Stay light on toes.  4. Maintain a steady rhythm.
